specialTraits.name: Web Sense
specialTraits.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

specialTraits.name: Charge
specialTraits.description: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

specialTraits.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
specialTraits.description: If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.
